summary: A house mod which is not big but contains most of the necessities of an adventurer.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Hofkiin
Version: 1.0
Date: 1/26/2014
Category: Buildings
Requirements: Skyrim (Updated to 1.9.32.0.8)
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
General Stores 2.3 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?)
General Displays 2.5 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32550/?)
This requires the Dawnguard and Dragonborn addons.
Author(s): BlackLink16

===============
MOD INFORMATION
===============

Description
===========
A house mod which is not big but contains most of the necessities of an adventurer.

Details
=======
The house is a collection of six separate 'rooms', each with a different style.
The main room, accessible from Skyrim, is a hub for the five other rooms.
Portals lead to an alchemy lab, crafting cave, enchanting library, treasure vault, and a small house.
The portals are the circular pads on the floor. Except for the house, which has a door.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
If the storage and display units aren't working, try installing the loose files.

The treasure vault has some problems with quest items. I added three pullbars to help with the three
buggiest items. The pullbars 'should' take the items from your inventory and add them to the displays.
Please save before using them, or else you could lose quest items forever.

===============================
INSTALLATION AND UNINSTALLATION
===============================

Manual Install
==============
1. Extract the files to your Skyrim data folder.
2. Check the .esp in the Skyrim Launcher.

NMM Install
===========
1. Download with the Nexus Mod Manager.
2. Activate in the NMM.

Manual Uninstall
================
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, uncheck the .esp.
2. Delete the .esp file.

NMM Uninstall
=============
1. Deactivate the mod in NMM.

===========
EXTRA STUFF
===========

History
=======
1.0 2014/01/26 - Initial release.

Credits
=======
Thanks to the Creation Kit wiki for script help (before I used other people's scripts).
Thanks to Harvey2112 for General Stores. You have simplified making this mod a lot with General Stores.
Thanks to tueffelachtein for General Displays. Half of the reason for making this house was to display artifacts. This was beyond useful.
Thanks to eldiabs for his modders' resource for pre-created bookshelves.
Thanks to Okiir and PyHarmonic. Halls of Dovahndor and Vjarkell Castle inspired me to make Hofkiin.
Thanks to nexusmods.com for hosting the mods.
Thanks to LHammonds for the readme generator.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.7-zip.org/download.html
TES5Edit - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
If you want a specific feature, I'd rather you make a suggestion to me to add in an update,
but if you have some great idea you want to add, go ahead. Please credit me and try to make
the update dependent on Hofkiin if possible.
author: BlackLink16
